trans-unit.source: If NAMELINK_SKIP is specified, NAMELINK_COMPONENT has no effect. It is not recommended to use NAMELINK_SKIP in conjunction with NAMELINK_COMPONENT.
trans-unit.target: 如果 NAMELINK_SKIP 指定， NAMELINK_COMPONENT 没有效果。不建议将 NAMELINK_SKIP 与 NAMELINK_COMPONENT 结合使用。

trans-unit.source: If NO_DEFAULT_PATH is specified, then no additional paths are added to the search. If NO_DEFAULT_PATH is not specified, the search process is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 NO_DEFAULT_PATH ，则不会将其他路径添加到搜索中。如果未指定 NO_DEFAULT_PATH ，则搜索过程如下：

trans-unit.source: If OBJC is not defined, the CC environment variable will be checked instead.
trans-unit.target: If OBJC is not defined, the CC environment variable will be checked instead.

trans-unit.source: If OBJCXX is not defined, the CXX environment variable will be checked instead.
trans-unit.target: If OBJCXX is not defined, the CXX environment variable will be checked instead.

trans-unit.source: If PARENT_SCOPE is present then the variable is removed from the scope above the current scope. See the same option in the set() command for further details.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 PARENT_SCOPE ，则将变量从当前作用域上方的作用域中删除。有关更多详细信息，请参见 set() 命令中的相同选项。

trans-unit.source: If PATH_SUFFIXES is specified, the suffixes are appended to each (W) or (U) directory entry one-by-one.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 PATH_SUFFIXES ，则将后缀一一追加到每个（ W ）或（ U ）目录条目。

trans-unit.source: If PREFIX_NAME is specified, the argument will be used as a prefix to all generated macros.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 PREFIX_NAME ，则该参数将用作所有生成的宏的前缀。

trans-unit.source: If Python2_FIND_FRAMEWORK is not defined, CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK variable will be used, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Python2_FIND_FRAMEWORK ， CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK 使用CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK变量（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: If Python3_FIND_ABI is not defined, any ABI will be searched.
trans-unit.target: If Python3_FIND_ABI is not defined, any ABI will be searched.

trans-unit.source: If Python3_FIND_FRAMEWORK is not defined, CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK variable will be used, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Python3_FIND_FRAMEWORK ， CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK 使用CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK变量（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: If Python_FIND_ABI is not defined, any ABI will be searched.
trans-unit.target: If Python_FIND_ABI is not defined, any ABI will be searched.

trans-unit.source: If Python_FIND_FRAMEWORK is not defined, CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK variable will be used, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Python_FIND_FRAMEWORK ， CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK 使用CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK变量（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: If QUIET is used, CTest will suppress any non-error messages that it otherwise would have printed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 QUIET ，则CTest将抑制所有本来会打印到控制台的非错误消息。

trans-unit.source: If SYMBOLIC (boolean) is set to True the build system will be informed that the source file is not actually created on disk but instead used as a symbolic name for a build rule.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 SYMBOLIC （布尔值）设置为 True ，则会通知生成系统，该源文件实际上不是在磁盘上创建的，而是用作生成规则的符号名称。

trans-unit.source: If TRACK is used, the submissions will go to the specified track on the CDash server. If no TRACK is specified, the name of the model is used by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 TRACK ，则提交将进入CDash服务器上的指定轨道。如果未指定 TRACK ，则默认使用模型名称。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, CMake will neither generate installation rules nor will it generate cmake_install.cmake files. This variable is FALSE by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则CMake既不会生成安装规则，也不会生成 cmake_install.cmake 文件。默认情况下，此变量为 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, use of deprecated functionality will issue fatal errors. If this variable is not set, CMake behaves as if it were set to FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则使用不建议使用的功能将发出致命错误。如果未设置此变量，则CMake的行为就像设置为 FALSE 一样。

trans-unit.source: If USE_BAR is true and USE_ZOT is false, this provides an option called USE_FOO that defaults to ON. Otherwise, it sets USE_FOO to OFF and hides the option from the user. If the status of USE_BAR or USE_ZOT ever changes, any value for the USE_FOO option is saved so that when the option is re-enabled it retains its old value.
trans-unit.target: If USE_BAR is true and USE_ZOT is false, this provides an option called USE_FOO that defaults to ON. Otherwise, it sets USE_FOO to OFF and hides the option from the user. If the status of USE_BAR or USE_ZOT ever changes, any value for the USE_FOO option is saved so that when the option is re-enabled it retains its old value.

trans-unit.source: If USE_STAMP_FILE is set, the custom command defined by this function will create a stamp file with the name <targetName>.stamp in the current binary directory whenever doxygen is re-run. With this option present, all items in <filesOrDirs> must be files (i.e. no directories, symlinks or wildcards) and each of the files must exist at the time doxygen_add_docs() is called. An error will be raised if any of the items listed is missing or is not a file when USE_STAMP_FILE is given. A dependency will be created on each of the files so that doxygen will only be re-run if one of the files is updated. Without the USE_STAMP_FILE option, doxygen will always be re-run if the <targetName> target is built regardless of whether anything listed in <filesOrDirs> has changed.
trans-unit.target: If USE_STAMP_FILE is set, the custom command defined by this function will create a stamp file with the name <targetName>.stamp in the current binary directory whenever doxygen is re-run. With this option present, all items in <filesOrDirs> must be files (i.e. no directories, symlinks or wildcards) and each of the files must exist at the time doxygen_add_docs() is called. An error will be raised if any of the items listed is missing or is not a file when USE_STAMP_FILE is given. A dependency will be created on each of the files so that doxygen will only be re-run if one of the files is updated. Without the USE_STAMP_FILE option, doxygen will always be re-run if the <targetName> target is built regardless of whether anything listed in <filesOrDirs> has changed.

trans-unit.source: If UseSWIG_MODULE_VERSION is 1 or is undefined, output is written to the CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UseSWIG_MODULE_VERSION 为1或未定义， CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 输出写入CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR目录。

trans-unit.source: If UseSWIG_MODULE_VERSION is 2, a dedicated directory will be used. The path of this directory can be retrieved from the SWIG_SUPPORT_FILES_DIRECTORY target property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UseSWIG_MODULE_VERSION 为2，将使用专用目录。可以从 SWIG_SUPPORT_FILES_DIRECTORY 目标属性中检索此目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: If UseSWIG_MODULE_VERSION is set to 2, it is strongly recommended to use a dedicated directory unique to the target when either the OUTPUT_DIR option or the CMAKE_SWIG_OUTDIR variable are specified. The output directory contents are erased as part of the target build, so to prevent interference between targets or losing other important files, each target should have its own dedicated output directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UseSWIG_MODULE_VERSION 设置为2，则在指定 OUTPUT_DIR 选项或 CMAKE_SWIG_OUTDIR 变量时，强烈建议使用目标唯一的专用目录。输出目录的内容将作为目标构建的一部分被擦除，因此，为了防止目标之间的干扰或丢失其他重要文件，每个目标应具有自己的专用输出目录。

trans-unit.source: If WIN32 is given the property WIN32_EXECUTABLE will be set on the target created. See documentation of that target property for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 WIN32 ,则将在创建的目标上设置 WIN32_EXECUTABLE 属性。有关详细信息，请参见该目标属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: If bison is found, the module defines the macro:
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了 bison ，则模块将定义宏：

trans-unit.source: If include(CPack) is used then by default this variable is set to the content of CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_DIRECTORY_PERMISSIONS.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 include(CPack) ，则默认情况下，此变量设置为 CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_DIRECTORY_PERMISSIONS 的内容。

trans-unit.source: If log and exp are available on the system, then we will use them to compute the square root in the mysqrt function. Add the following code to the mysqrt function in MathFunctions/mysqrt.cxx (don’t forget the #endif before returning the result!):
trans-unit.target: If log and exp are available on the system, then we will use them to compute the square root in the mysqrt function. Add the following code to the mysqrt function in MathFunctions/mysqrt.cxx (don’t forget the #endif before returning the result!):

trans-unit.source: If make install is invoked and directories are implicitly created they get permissions set by CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_DIRECTORY_PERMISSIONS variable or platform specific default permissions if the variable is not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 make install 并隐式创建目录，则它们将获得由 CMAKE_INSTALL_DEFAULT_DIRECTORY_PERMISSIONS 变量设置的权限，或者如果未设置该变量，则为平台特定的默认权限。

trans-unit.source: If make install is invoked or INSTALL is built, this directory is prepended onto all install directories. This variable defaults to /usr/local on UNIX and c:/Program Files/${PROJECT_NAME} on Windows. See CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX_INITIALIZED_TO_DEFAULT for how a project might choose its own default.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 make install 或构建了 INSTALL ，则此目录位于所有安装目录的前面。在UNIX上，此变量默认为 /usr/local ;在Windows上，此变量默认为 c:/Program Files/${PROJECT_NAME} 。有关项目如何选择其默认值的信息，请参见 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX_INITIALIZED_TO_DEFAULT 。

trans-unit.source: If pkg-config returns multiple values for the specified variable, resultVar will contain a ;-list.
trans-unit.target: 如果 pkg-config 返回指定变量的多个值，则 resultVar 将包含; -list。

trans-unit.source: If ALL is set, the target will be added to the default build target.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为ALL,则目标将被添加到默认的构建目标中。

trans-unit.source: If Boost was built using the boost-cmake project or from Boost 1.70.0 on it provides a package configuration file for use with find_package’s config mode. This module looks for the package configuration file called BoostConfig.cmake or boost-config.cmake and stores the result in CACHE entry “Boost_DIR”. If found, the package configuration file is loaded and this module returns with no further action. See documentation of the Boost CMake package configuration for details on what it provides.
trans-unit.target: 如果Boost是使用boost-cmake项目或从Boost 1.70.0构建的，则它将提供一个程序包配置文件，以与find_package的配置模式一起使用。该模块查找名为 BoostConfig.cmake 或 boost-config.cmake 的软件包配置文件，并将结果存储在 CACHE 条目“ Boost_DIR”中。如果找到，则将加载程序包配置文件，并且该模块将不执行任何进一步操作而返回。有关提供的内容的详细信息，请参见Boost CMake软件包配置的文档。

trans-unit.source: If CMake is currently processing deferred calls scheduled by the cmake_language(DEFER) command, this variable evaluates to DEFERRED instead of a specific line number.
trans-unit.target: If CMake is currently processing deferred calls scheduled by the cmake_language(DEFER) command, this variable evaluates to DEFERRED instead of a specific line number.

trans-unit.source: If CMake is run with the Makefile or Ninja generator, then include(CPack) also generates a target package_source. To build a source package, instead of cpack -G TGZ --config CPackSourceConfig.cmake one may call cmake --build . --target package_source, make package_source, or ninja package_source.
trans-unit.target: If CMake is run with the Makefile or Ninja generator, then include(CPack) also generates a target package_source . To build a source package, instead of cpack -G TGZ --config CPackSourceConfig.cmake one may call cmake --build . --target package_source , make package_source , or ninja package_source .

trans-unit.source: If CMake is run with the Makefile, Ninja, or Xcode generator, then include(CPack) generates a target package. This makes it possible to build a binary installer from CMake, Make, or Ninja: Instead of cpack, one may call cmake --build . --target package or make package or ninja package. The VS generator creates an uppercase target PACKAGE.
trans-unit.target: If CMake is run with the Makefile, Ninja, or Xcode generator, then include(CPack) generates a target package . This makes it possible to build a binary installer from CMake, Make, or Ninja: Instead of cpack , one may call cmake --build . --target package or make package or ninja package . The VS generator creates an uppercase target PACKAGE .

trans-unit.source: If CTest is asked to run only a subset of tests (e.g. using regular expressions or the --rerun-failed option) and the cleanup test is not in the set of tests to run, it will automatically be added if any tests in the set require any fixture listed in FIXTURES_CLEANUP.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求CTest仅运行一部分测试（例如，使用正则表达式或 --rerun-failed 选项），并且清除测试不在要运行的测试集中，则如果该测试集中有任何测试，它将自动添加需要 FIXTURES_CLEANUP 中列出的任何灯具。

trans-unit.source: If CTest is asked to run only a subset of tests (e.g. using regular expressions or the --rerun-failed option) and the setup test is not in the set of tests to run, it will automatically be added if any tests in the set require any fixture listed in FIXTURES_SETUP.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求CTest仅运行一部分测试（例如，使用正则表达式或 --rerun-failed 选项），而setup测试不在要运行的测试集中，则它将自动添加到测试集中。需要 FIXTURES_SETUP 中列出的任何灯具。

trans-unit.source: If CURL was built using the CMake buildsystem then it provides its own CURLConfig.cmake file for use with the find_package() command’s config mode. This module looks for this file and, if found, returns its results with no further action.
trans-unit.target: 如果CURL是使用CMake构建系统构建的，则它将提供自己的 CURLConfig.cmake 文件，以与 find_package() 命令的配置模式一起使用。该模块查找该文件，如果找到该文件，则不执行任何进一步操作就返回其结果。

trans-unit.source: If False, do not try to use the relevant CMake wrapping command.
trans-unit.target: 如果False,不要尝试使用相关的CMake封装命令。

trans-unit.source: If False, optional Yy part of Xxx system is not available.
trans-unit.target: 如果False,则Xxx系统中可选的YY部分不可用。

trans-unit.source: If GSL is found, this module defines the following IMPORTED targets:
trans-unit.target: 如果找到GSL，则此模块定义以下 IMPORTED 目标：

trans-unit.source: If USE_BAR is true and USE_ZOT is false, this provides an option called USE_FOO that defaults to ON. Otherwise, it sets USE_FOO to OFF. If the status of USE_BAR or USE_ZOT ever changes, any value for the USE_FOO option is saved so that when the option is re-enabled it retains its old value.
trans-unit.target: 如果 USE_BAR 为 true,USE_ZOT 为 false,则会提供一个叫做 USE_FOO 的选项,默认为 ON,否则会将 USE_FOO 设置为 OFF。否则,它会将 USE_FOO 设置为 OFF。如果 USE_BAR 或 USE_ZOT 的状态发生变化,则 USE_FOO 选项的任何值都会被保存,这样当该选项被重新启用时,它就会保留原来的值。

trans-unit.source: If a CMAKE_TARGET_MESSAGES cache entry exists its value initializes the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在 CMAKE_TARGET_MESSAGES 高速缓存条目，则其值将初始化此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If a FILENAME is given, the information is printed into this file. If APPEND is used, it is appended to this file, otherwise the file is overwritten if it already existed. If the VAR option is used, the information is “printed” into the specified variable. If FILENAME is not used, the information is printed to the terminal. Using the DESCRIPTION option a description or headline can be set which will be printed above the actual content. If only one type of package was requested, no title is printed, unless it is explicitly set using either DESCRIPTION to use a custom string, or DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION to use a default title for the requested type. If INCLUDE_QUIET_PACKAGES is given, packages which have been searched with find_package(... QUIET) will also be listed. By default they are skipped. If FATAL_ON_MISSING_REQUIRED_PACKAGES is given, CMake will abort if a package which is marked as one of the package types listed in the FeatureSummary_REQUIRED_PKG_TYPES global property has not been found. The default value for the FeatureSummary_REQUIRED_PKG_TYPES global property is REQUIRED.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 FILENAME ，则信息将打印到该文件中。如果使用 APPEND ，则将其附加到此文件，否则，如果文件已存在，则将其覆盖。如果使用VAR选项，则将信息“打印”到指定的变量中。如果未使用 FILENAME ，则将信息打印到终端。使用 DESCRIPTION 选项可以设置描述或标题，该描述或标题将打印在实际内容的上方。如果仅请求一种类型的程序包，则不会打印任何标题，除非使用Description（ DESCRIPTION 使用自定义字符串或将 DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION 显式设置为所请求的类型使用默认标题。如果是 INCLUDE_QUIET_PACKAGES 如果给出，则将列出用 find_package(... QUIET) 搜索过的软件包。默认情况下，它们被跳过。如果给出了 FATAL_ON_MISSING_REQUIRED_PACKAGES ，则如果未找到标记为 FeatureSummary_REQUIRED_PKG_TYPES 全局属性中列出的软件包类型之一的软件包，CMake将中止。 FeatureSummary_REQUIRED_PKG_TYPES 全局属性的默认值为 REQUIRED 。

trans-unit.source: If a Makefile or Ninja generator is used to generate the build tree, it is not recommended to invoke make or ninja directly. Instead, it is recommended that the IDE invoke cmake(1) with the --build argument, which will in turn invoke the appropriate build tool.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用Makefile或Ninja生成器生成构建树，则不建议直接调用 make 或 ninja 。相反，建议IDE使用 --build 参数调用 cmake(1) ，这将依次调用适当的构建工具。

trans-unit.source: If a Qt macro is found, then the C++ source file <base>.<source_extension> is expected to as well contain an include statement
trans-unit.target: 如果找到Qt宏，则C ++源文件 <base>.<source_extension> 也应包含include语句

trans-unit.source: If a Qt macro is found, then the header will be compiled by the moc to the output file moc_<base_name>.cpp. The complete output file path is described in the section Output file location.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了Qt宏，则该头文件将由 moc 编译到输出文件 moc_<base_name>.cpp 中。完整的输出文件路径在输出文件位置一节中描述。

trans-unit.source: If a binary target is linked transitively to a macOS FRAMEWORK, the Headers directory of the framework is also treated as a usage requirement. This has the same effect as passing the framework directory as an include directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果二进制目标暂时连接到macOS FRAMEWORK ，则框架的 Headers 目录也被视为使用要求。这与将框架目录作为包含目录传递具有相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: If a download method is specified, any existing contents of the source directory may be deleted. Only the URL download method checks whether this directory is either missing or empty before initiating the download, stopping with an error if it is not empty. All other download methods silently discard any previous contents of the source directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了下载方法,源目录中的任何现有内容都可能被删除。只有URL下载方法在启动下载前会检查该目录是否缺失或为空,如果不为空,则以一个错误停止。所有其他的下载方法都会默默地丢弃源目录中以前的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: If a file is specified, the version is written into it. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了文件，则将版本写入其中。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: If a library does not export any symbols, it must not be declared as a SHARED library. For example, a Windows resource DLL or a managed C++/CLI DLL that exports no unmanaged symbols would need to be a MODULE library. This is because CMake expects a SHARED library to always have an associated import library on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 如果库未导出任何符号，则不得将其声明为 SHARED 库。例如，Windows资源DLL或不导出任何非托管符号的托管C ++ / CLI DLL都需要成为 MODULE 库。这是因为CMake期望 SHARED 库在Windows上始终具有关联的导入库。

trans-unit.source: If a library search path must be provided, prefer to localize the effect where possible by using the target_link_directories() command rather than link_directories(). The target-specific command can also control how the search directories propagate to other dependent targets.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须提供一个库搜索路径，倾向于通过使用本地化在可能的效果 target_link_directories() 命令，而不是 link_directories() 。特定于目标的命令还可以控制搜索目录如何传播到其他从属目标。

trans-unit.source: If a macro from AUTOMOC_MACRO_NAMES is found in a header file, moc will be run on the file. The result will be put into a file named according to moc_<basename>.cpp. If the macro is found in a C++ implementation file, the moc output will be put into a file named according to <basename>.moc, following the Qt conventions. The <basename>.moc must be included by the user in the C++ implementation file with a preprocessor #include.
trans-unit.target: 如果在头文件中找到了来自 AUTOMOC_MACRO_NAMES 的宏，则将在该文件上运行 moc 。结果将放入根据 moc_<basename>.cpp 命名的文件中。如果在C ++实现文件中找到该宏，则将按照Qt约定将moc输出放入根据 <basename>.moc 命名的文件中。用户必须使用预处理器 #include 将 <basename>.moc 包含在C ++实现文件中。

trans-unit.source: If a module is found, the <prefix>_MODULE_NAME variable will contain the name of the matching module. This variable can be used if you need to run pkg_get_variable().
trans-unit.target: 如果找到模块，则 <prefix>_MODULE_NAME 变量将包含匹配模块的名称。如果您需要运行 pkg_get_variable() ,则可以使用此变量。

trans-unit.source: If a module is specified instead of a file, the file with name <modulename>.cmake is searched first in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH, then in the CMake module directory. There is one exception to this: if the file which calls include() is located itself in the CMake builtin module directory, then first the CMake builtin module directory is searched and CMAKE_MODULE_PATH afterwards. See also policy CMP0017.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定模块而不是文件，则首先在 CMAKE_MODULE_PATH 中搜索名称为 <modulename>.cmake 的文件，然后在CMake模块目录中搜索。对此有一个例外：如果调用 include() 的文件本身位于CMake内置模块目录中，则首先搜索CMake内置模块目录，然后搜索 CMAKE_MODULE_PATH 。另请参阅策略 CMP0017 。

trans-unit.source: If a module library target has this property set to true it will be built as a CFBundle when built on the mac. It will have the directory structure required for a CFBundle and will be suitable to be used for creating Browser Plugins or other application resources.
trans-unit.target: 如果模块库目标将此属性设置为true，则在Mac上构建时，它将作为 CFBundle 构建。它具有 CFBundle 所需的目录结构，适用于创建浏览器插件或其他应用程序资源。

trans-unit.source: If a module library target has this property set to true it will be built as a CFBundle when built on the Mac. It will have the directory structure required for a CFBundle.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个模块库目标的这个属性被设置为 "true",那么它在Mac上构建时就会被构建成一个CFBundle。它将拥有CFBundle所需的目录结构。

trans-unit.source: If a non-full path value is supplied then CMake will resolve the full path of the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了一个非全路径值,那么CMake将解析编译器的全路径。

trans-unit.source: If a preprocessor #include directive is found which matches <path>ui_<basename>.h, and a <basename>.ui file exists, then uic will be executed to generate the appropriate file. The <basename>.ui file is searched for in the following places
trans-unit.target: 如果找到与 <path>ui_<basename>.h 匹配的预处理器 #include 指令，并且存在 <basename>.ui 文件，则将执行 uic 生成适当的文件。该 <basename>.ui 文件中搜索在以下地方

trans-unit.source: If a project arranges for package registry entries to exist, such as:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个项目安排包注册表条目存在,如:

trans-unit.source: If a project has presets available, either through CMakePresets.json or CMakeUserPresets.json, the list of presets will appear in a drop-down menu in cmake-gui(1) between the source directory and the binary directory. Choosing a preset sets the binary directory, generator, environment variables, and cache variables, but all of these options can be overridden after a preset is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目具有可用的预设（通过 CMakePresets.json 或 CMakeUserPresets.json )，则预设列表将显示在 cmake-gui(1) 的下拉菜单中，位于源目录和二进制目录之间。选择一个预设会设置二进制目录，生成器，环境变量和高速缓存变量，但是在选择了预设之后，所有这些选项都可以被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If a relative path is given it is interpreted relative to the value of the CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX variable. The prefix can be relocated at install time using the DESTDIR mechanism explained in the CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX variable documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了相对路径，则将相对于 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 变量的值进行解释。可以使用 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 变量文档中介绍的 DESTDIR 机制在安装时重定位该前缀。

trans-unit.source: If a required dependency is not found by cmake(1), the cache is populated with an entry which contains a NOTFOUND value. This value can be replaced by specifying it on the command line, or in the ccmake(1) or cmake-gui(1) tool. See the User Interaction Guide for more about setting cache entries.
trans-unit.target: 如果 cmake(1) 未找到所需的依赖项，则使用包含 NOTFOUND 值的条目填充缓存。可以通过在命令行上，或在 ccmake(1) 或 cmake-gui(1) 工具中指定此值来替换该值。有关设置缓存条目的更多信息，请参见《 User Interaction Guide 。

trans-unit.source: If a selected architecture is available for both: device SDK and simulator SDK it will be built for the SDK selected by CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT and removed from the corresponding SDK.
trans-unit.target: 如果选定的体系结构可用于以下两种：设备SDK和模拟器SDK，它将为 CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT 选择的SDK构建，并从相应的SDK中删除。

trans-unit.source: If a sequential execution of multiple commands is required, use multiple execute_process() calls with a single COMMAND argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要顺序执行多个命令，请对单个 COMMAND 参数使用多个 execute_process() 调用。

trans-unit.source: If a single target needs to produce more than one jar from its java source code, to prevent the accumulation of duplicate class files in subsequent jars, set/reset CMAKE_JAR_CLASSES_PREFIX prior to calling the add_jar() function:
trans-unit.target: 如果单个目标需要从其Java源代码中产生多个jar，为防止在后续jar中积累重复的类文件， CMAKE_JAR_CLASSES_PREFIX 在调用 add_jar() 函数之前设置/重置CMAKE_JAR_CLASSES_PREFIX：

trans-unit.source: If a source file matches multiple groups, the last group that explicitly lists the file with FILES will be favored, if any. If no group explicitly lists the file, the last group whose regular expression matches the file will be favored.
trans-unit.target: 如果源文件与多个组匹配，则最好使用显式列出带有 FILES 的文件的最后一个组（如果有）。如果没有任何组显式列出文件，则倾向于使用正则表达式与该文件匹配的最后一个组。

trans-unit.source: If a static or object library has dependency optimization enabled, it first discards all dependencies. Then, it looks through all of the direct and indirect dependencies that it initially had, and adds them back if they meet any of the following criteria:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个静态或对象库启用了依赖性优化,它首先会丢弃所有的依赖性。然后,它会查看所有最初拥有的直接和间接依赖关系,如果它们满足以下任何一个标准,就会将它们添加回来。

trans-unit.source: If a step target is created for an independent step by the ExternalProject_Add()STEP_TARGETS option or by the ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() function, it will not depend on the external targets, but may depend on targets for other steps.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过 ExternalProject_Add() STEP_TARGETS 选项或 ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() 函数为独立步骤创建了步骤目标，则该步骤目标将不依赖于外部目标，而可能依赖于其他步骤的目标。

trans-unit.source: If a supported thread library was found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了支持的线程库。

trans-unit.source: If a target has EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL set to true, it may still be listed in an install(TARGETS) command, but the user is responsible for ensuring that the target’s build artifacts are not missing or outdated when an install is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标的 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 设置为true，则可能仍会在 install(TARGETS) 命令中列出该目标，但用户有责任确保执行安装时目标的构建工件不会丢失或过时。

trans-unit.source: If a test in the set of tests to be executed requires a particular fixture, that fixture’s setup and cleanup tests would normally be added to the test set automatically. This option prevents adding setup or cleanup tests for fixtures matching the <regex>. Note that all other fixture behavior is retained, including test dependencies and skipping tests that have fixture setup tests that fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果要执行的一组测试中的一个测试需要特定的夹具，则该夹具的设置和清除测试通常会自动添加到测试集中。此选项可防止为与 <regex> 匹配的灯具添加设置或清除测试。请注意，所有其他灯具行为都将保留，包括测试相关性和具有失败的灯具设置测试的跳过测试。

trans-unit.source: If a test with the FIXTURES_SETUP property set is DISABLED, the fixture behavior will be as though that setup test was passing and any test case requiring that fixture will still run.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 FIXTURES_SETUP 属性的测试为 DISABLED ，那么灯具的行为就好像安装测试已通过，并且需要该灯具的任何测试用例仍将运行。

trans-unit.source: If a user passes -DMY_CUSTOM_VARIABLE=SomeValue to CMake then this setting will be made visible to the toolchain file both for the main project and for test projects generated by the try_compile() command source file signature.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户将 -DMY_CUSTOM_VARIABLE=SomeValue 传递给CMake，则对于主项目和 try_compile() 命令源文件签名生成的测试项目，此设置将对工具链文件可见。

trans-unit.source: If all of these parameters were not sufficient to find the right MPI implementation, a user may disable the entire autodetection process by specifying both a list of libraries in MPI_<lang>_LIBRARIES and a list of include directories in MPI_<lang>_ADDITIONAL_INCLUDE_DIRS. Any other variable may be set in addition to these two. The module will then validate the MPI settings and store the settings in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有这些参数都不足以找到合适的MPI实现中，用户可以通过指定既是库列表禁用整个自动检测过程 MPI_<lang>_LIBRARIES 和名单的包括在目录 MPI_<lang>_ADDITIONAL_INCLUDE_DIRS 。除了这两个以外，还可以设置其他任何变量。然后，模块将验证MPI设置，并将设置存储在缓存中。

trans-unit.source: If an install() command is used without the COMPONENT argument, these files will be grouped into a default component. The name of this default install component will be taken from this variable. It defaults to Unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用不带 COMPONENT 参数的 install() 命令，则这些文件将被分组为默认组件。该默认安装组件的名称将从该变量中获取。默认为 Unspecified 。

trans-unit.source: If an IDE project generator is used, such as Xcode or one of the Visual Studio generators, and the IDE understands the project format used, the IDE should read the project file and build it the same way it would otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了IDE项目生成器（例如 Xcode 或Visual Studio生成器之一），并且IDE能够理解所使用的项目格式，则IDE应该读取该项目文件并以其他方式构建该文件。

trans-unit.source: If an absolute path (with a leading slash or drive letter) is given it is used verbatim.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定了绝对路径(带前导斜线或驱动字母),则逐字使用。

trans-unit.source: If an additional clean file is specific to a single target only, then the ADDITIONAL_CLEAN_FILES target property would usually be a better choice than this directory property.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他清除文件仅特定于单个目标，则 ADDITIONAL_CLEAN_FILES 目标属性通常比该目录属性更好。

trans-unit.source: If an imported library has the IMPORTED_NO_SONAME target property set, CMake may ask the linker to search for the library instead of using the full path (e.g. /usr/lib/libfoo.so becomes -lfoo).
trans-unit.target: 如果导入的库设置了 IMPORTED_NO_SONAME 目标属性，则CMake可能会要求链接程序搜索库而不是使用完整路径（例如 /usr/lib/libfoo.so 变为 -lfoo ）。

trans-unit.source: If an interface library has source files (i.e. the SOURCES target property is set), it will appear in the generated buildsystem as a build target much like a target defined by the add_custom_target() command. It does not compile any sources, but does contain build rules for custom commands created by the add_custom_command() command.
trans-unit.target: 如果接口库具有源文件（即，设置了 SOURCES target属性），则它将在生成的构建系统中作为构建目标出现，就像 add_custom_target() 命令定义的目标一样。它不编译 add_custom_command() ，但是包含由add_custom_command（）命令创建的自定义命令的构建规则。

trans-unit.source: If another project wishes to use Foo it need only to locate the FooConfig.cmake file and load it to get all the information it needs about package content locations. Since the package configuration file is provided by the package installation it already knows all the file locations.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一个项目希望使用 Foo ,则只需找到 FooConfig.cmake 文件并加载它即可获取所需的有关包内容位置的所有信息。由于软件包配置文件是由软件包安装提供的，因此它已经知道所有文件位置。

trans-unit.source: If any RPATH/RUNPATH entries passed to the linker contain the CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX, the matching path fragments are replaced with the CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递给链接器的任何 RPATH / RUNPATH 条目包含 CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX ，则将匹配的路径片段替换为 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 。

trans-unit.source: If any dependency is an OUTPUT of another custom command in the same directory (CMakeLists.txt file), CMake automatically brings the other custom command into the target in which this command is built. A target-level dependency is added if any dependency is listed as BYPRODUCTS of a target or any of its build events in the same directory to ensure the byproducts will be available.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何依赖关系是同一目录（ CMakeLists.txt 文件）中另一个自定义命令的 OUTPUT ，则CMake会自动将另一个自定义命令带入构建此命令的目标中。如果任何依赖项在同一目录中作为目标的 BYPRODUCTS 或其任何构建事件列出，则将添加目标级别的依赖关系，以确保副产品可用。

trans-unit.source: If any macros should be provided by the MathFunctions package, they should be in a separate file which is installed to the same location as the MathFunctionsConfig.cmake file, and included from there.
trans-unit.target: 如果 MathFunctions 软件包应提供任何宏，则它们应位于单独的文件中，该文件安装在与 MathFunctionsConfig.cmake 文件相同的位置，并从此处包含。

trans-unit.source: If any of a fixture’s setup tests fail, none of the tests listing that fixture in its FIXTURES_REQUIRED property will be run. Cleanup tests will, however, still be executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何灯具的安装程序测试失败，则不会运行任何在其 FIXTURES_REQUIRED 属性中列出该灯具的测试。但是，清理测试仍将执行。

trans-unit.source: If any of the above ..._DIR options are not specified, their defaults are computed as follows. If the PREFIX option is given or the EP_PREFIX directory property is set, then an external project is built and installed under the specified prefix:
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定上述任何 ..._DIR 选项，则其默认值的计算如下。如果给出了 PREFIX 选项或设置了 EP_PREFIX 目录属性，那么将在指定的前缀下构建并安装一个外部项目：

trans-unit.source: If any of the extracted files changes, then the moc file for the source file gets rebuilt even when the source file itself doesn’t change.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何提取的文件发生更改，那么即使源文件本身未更改，也将重建源文件的 moc 文件。

trans-unit.source: If any of the extracted files is GENERATED or if it is not in the target’s sources, then it might be necessary to add it to the _autogen target dependencies. See AUTOGEN_TARGET_DEPENDS for reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何提取的文件都是 GENERATED 或不在目标源中，则可能有必要将其添加到 _autogen 目标依赖项中。请参阅 AUTOGEN_TARGET_DEPENDS 以获取参考。

trans-unit.source: If called from within a find module loaded by find_package(<PackageName>), search prefixes unique to the current package being found. Specifically look in the <PackageName>_ROOT CMake variable and the <PackageName>_ROOT environment variable. The package root variables are maintained as a stack so if called from nested find modules, root paths from the parent’s find module will be searched after paths from the current module, i.e. <CurrentPackage>_ROOT, ENV{<CurrentPackage>_ROOT}, <ParentPackage>_ROOT, ENV{<ParentPackage>_ROOT}, etc. This can be skipped if NO_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH is passed. See policy CMP0074.
trans-unit.target: 如果从 find_package(<PackageName>) 加载的find模块中调用，则搜索前缀对于当前要查找的包是唯一的。具体查看 <PackageName>_ROOT CMake变量和 <PackageName>_ROOT 环境变量。包的根变量作为堆栈维护，因此如果从嵌套查找模块调用，则将在当前模块的路径之后搜索父级查找模块的根路径，即 <CurrentPackage>_ROOT ， ENV{<CurrentPackage>_ROOT} ， <ParentPackage>_ROOT ， ENV{<ParentPackage>_ROOT} 等。如果传递了 NO_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH ,则可以跳过。请参阅策略 CMP0074 。

trans-unit.source: If called from within a find module or any other script loaded by a call to find_package(<PackageName>), search prefixes unique to the current package being found. Specifically, look in the <PackageName>_ROOT CMake variable and the <PackageName>_ROOT environment variable. The package root variables are maintained as a stack, so if called from nested find modules or config packages, root paths from the parent’s find module or config package will be searched after paths from the current module or package. In other words, the search order would be <CurrentPackage>_ROOT, ENV{<CurrentPackage>_ROOT}, <ParentPackage>_ROOT, ENV{<ParentPackage>_ROOT}, etc. This can be skipped if NO_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH is passed or by setting the CMAKE_FIND_USE_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH to FALSE. See policy CMP0074.
trans-unit.target: 如果从查找模块中调用，或者从对 find_package(<PackageName>) 的调用加载的任何其他脚本中调用，则搜索前缀对于找到的当前包是唯一的。具体来说，请查看 <PackageName>_ROOT CMake变量和 <PackageName>_ROOT 环境变量。包的根变量作为堆栈维护，因此，如果从嵌套查找模块或配置包中调用，则将在当前模块或包的路径之后搜索父级查找模块或配置包的根路径。换句话说，搜索顺序为 <CurrentPackage>_ROOT ， ENV{<CurrentPackage>_ROOT} ， <ParentPackage>_ROOT ， ENV{<ParentPackage>_ROOT} 等等。如果传递了 NO_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH 或将 CMAKE_FIND_USE_PACKAGE_ROOT_PATH 设置为 FALSE ，则可以跳过此操作。请参阅策略 CMP0074 。

trans-unit.source: If calling both find_package(PythonInterp) and find_package(PythonLibs), call find_package(PythonInterp) first to get the currently active Python version by default with a consistent version of PYTHON_LIBRARIES.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时调用 find_package(PythonInterp) 和 find_package(PythonLibs) ，则首先调用 find_package(PythonInterp) 以默认获得当前活动的Python版本，并具有一致的PYTHON_LIBRARIES版本。

trans-unit.source: If compiling with MSVC, this variable can be set to MT or MD (the default) to enable searching a GTest build tree
trans-unit.target: 如果使用MSVC进行编译，则可以将此变量设置为 MT 或 MD （默认值）以启用搜索GTest构建树的功能

trans-unit.source: If component Development is specified, it implies sub-components Development.Module and Development.Embed.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了组件 Development ，则意味着子组件 Development.Module 和 Development.Embed 。

trans-unit.source: If components Interpreter and Development (or one of its sub-components) are both specified, this module search only for interpreter with same platform architecture as the one defined by CMake configuration. This constraint does not apply if only Interpreter component is specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时指定了组件 Interpreter 和 Development （或其子组件之一），则此模块仅搜索与 CMake 配置定义的平台架构相同的平台架构的解释器。如果仅指定 Interpreter 组件，则此约束不适用。

trans-unit.source: If components Interpreter and Development are both specified, this module search only for interpreter with same platform architecture as the one defined by CMake configuration. This contraint does not apply if only Interpreter component is specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时指定了组件 Interpreter 和 Development ，则此模块仅搜索具有与 CMake 配置定义的平台架构相同的平台架构的解释器。如果仅指定 Interpreter 组件，则此约束不适用。

trans-unit.source: If enabled, generates a compile_commands.json file containing the exact compiler calls for all translation units of the project in machine-readable form. The format of the JSON file looks like:
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，将生成一个 compile_commands.json 文件，该文件包含机器可读形式的项目所有翻译单元的确切编译器调用。JSON文件的格式如下：

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the Xcode generator will generate only a single Xcode project file for the topmost project() command instead of generating one for every project() command.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，则 Xcode 生成器将为最顶层的 project() 命令仅生成一个Xcode项目文件，而不是为每个 project() 命令生成一个Xcode项目文件。

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the Xcode generator will generate schema files. These are useful to invoke analyze, archive, build-for-testing and test actions from the command line.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用， Xcode 生成器将生成模式文件。这些对于从命令行调用分析，存档，测试构建和测试操作很有用。

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the Xcode generator will generate only a single Xcode project file for the topmost project() command instead of generating one for every project() command.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，则 Xcode 生成器将只为最顶层的 project() 命令生成一个Xcode项目文件，而不是为每个 project() 命令生成一个Xcode项目文件。

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the Xcode generator will generate schema files. These are useful to invoke analyze, archive, build-for-testing and test actions from the command line.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用， Xcode 生成器将生成模式文件。这些对于从命令行调用分析，存档，测试构建和测试操作很有用。

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the main build’s default ALL target will not depend on the test step. This can be a useful way of ensuring the test step is defined but only gets invoked when manually requested.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，则主版本的默认“全部”目标将不取决于测试步骤。这是确保定义测试步骤但仅在手动请求时才被调用的有用方法。

trans-unit.source: If enabled, the main build’s default ALL target will not depend on the test step. This can be a useful way of ensuring the test step is defined but only gets invoked when manually requested. This may cause a step target to be created automatically for either the install or build step. See policy CMP0114.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，则主版本的默认“全部”目标将不取决于测试步骤。这是确保定义测试步骤但仅在手动请求时才被调用的有用方法。这可能会导致为 install 或 build 步骤自动创建步骤目标。请参阅策略 CMP0114 。

trans-unit.source: If enabled, this gives the custom step direct access to the terminal if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用,如果可能,这将使自定义步骤直接访问终端。

trans-unit.source: If enabling ASM, enable it last so that CMake can check whether compilers for other languages like C work for assembly too.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用 ASM ，请最后启用它，以便CMake可以检查其他语言（例如 C )的编译器是否也可以进行汇编。

trans-unit.source: If enabling ASM, list it last so that CMake can check whether compilers for other languages like C work for assembly too.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用 ASM ，请最后列出它，以便CMake可以检查其他语言（例如 C )的编译器是否也可以进行汇编。

trans-unit.source: If false, do not try to link to OpenAL
trans-unit.target: 如果为 "false",不要尝试链接到OpenAL。

trans-unit.source: If false, do not try to use GIF.
trans-unit.target: 如果为假,不要尝试使用GIF。

trans-unit.source: If false, do not try to use JPEG.
trans-unit.target: 如果为假,则不要尝试使用JPEG。

trans-unit.source: If false, do not try to use PNG.
trans-unit.target: 如果为假,不要尝试使用PNG。

trans-unit.source: If false, don’t try to use Qt 4.
trans-unit.target: 如果为false，请不要尝试使用Qt 4。

trans-unit.source: If false, don’t try to use Qt 4. This variable is for compatibility only.
trans-unit.target: 如果为false，请不要尝试使用Qt4。此变量仅出于兼容性考虑。

trans-unit.source: If false, don’t try to use Qt. This variable is for compatibility only.
trans-unit.target: 如果为false，请不要尝试使用Qt。此变量仅用于兼容性。

trans-unit.source: If flex is found on the system, the module provides the macro:
trans-unit.target: 如果在系统中发现flex,该模块提供了宏。

trans-unit.source: If it is not set, or is set to a non-integer value, a sensible default limit is used. If the recursion limit is reached, the script terminates immediately with a fatal error.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置,或者设置为非整数,则使用一个合理的默认限制。如果达到了递归限制,脚本会立即终止,并产生一个致命的错误。

trans-unit.source: If left out the all target is built.
trans-unit.target: 如果遗漏了 all 目标，那就建立起来。

trans-unit.source: If library type is not specified, MODULE is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定库类型，则假定为 MODULE 。

trans-unit.source: If mangling for a category is not known, its macro is left undefined. All macros require raw names in both lower case and upper case.
trans-unit.target: 如果不知道某个类别的混名,则其宏未定义。所有的宏都要求用小写和大写的原始名称。

trans-unit.source: If many external projects should have the same set of step targets, setting a directory property may be more convenient. The build step target could be created automatically by setting the EP_STEP_TARGETS directory property before creating the external projects with ExternalProject_Add():
trans-unit.target: 如果许多外部项目应具有相同的步骤目标集，则设置目录属性可能更方便。在使用 ExternalProject_Add() 创建外部项目之前，可以通过设置 EP_STEP_TARGETS 目录属性来自动创建 build 步骤目标：

trans-unit.source: If many external projects should have the same set of step targets, setting a directory property may be more convenient. The build step target could be created automatically by setting the EP_STEP_TARGETS directory property before creating the external projects with ExternalProject_Add():
trans-unit.target: 如果许多外部项目应具有相同的步骤目标集，则设置目录属性可能更方便。在使用 ExternalProject_Add() 创建外部项目之前，可以通过设置 EP_STEP_TARGETS 目录属性来自动创建 build 步骤目标：

trans-unit.source: If more than one OUTPUT_* or ERROR_* option is given for the same pipe the precedence is not specified. If no OUTPUT_* or ERROR_* options are given the output will be shared with the corresponding pipes of the CMake process itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果为同一管道提供多个 OUTPUT_* 或 ERROR_* 选项，则不指定优先级。如果没有 OUTPUT_* 或 ERROR_* 选项，则输出将与CMake进程本身的相应管道共享。

trans-unit.source: If more than one artifact is specified, it is the user’s responsibility to ensure the consistency of the various artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了多个工件，则用户有责任确保各种工件的一致性。

trans-unit.source: If more than one library was found, all of them should be included in these variables (see the Standard Variable Names section for more information).
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了多个库，则所有这些库都应包含在这些变量中（有关更多信息，请参见“ 标准变量名”部分）。

trans-unit.source: If multiple tests specify the same resource lock, they are guaranteed not to run concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个测试指定了同一个资源锁,则保证不会同时运行。

trans-unit.source: If neither JOB_POOL_PRECOMPILE_HEADER nor CMAKE_JOB_POOL_PRECOMPILE_HEADER are set then JOB_POOL_COMPILE will be used for this task.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 JOB_POOL_PRECOMPILE_HEADER 和 CMAKE_JOB_POOL_PRECOMPILE_HEADER ，则将 JOB_POOL_COMPILE 用于此任务。

trans-unit.source: If neither NETRC option is given CMake will check variables CMAKE_NETRC and CMAKE_NETRC_FILE, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出 NETRC 选项，则CMake将分别检查变量 CMAKE_NETRC 和 CMAKE_NETRC_FILE 。

trans-unit.source: If neither of the above conditions are met, it is assumed that the command name is a program to be found on the PATH at build time.
trans-unit.target: 如果以上两个条件都不满足，则假定命令名称是在构建时在 PATH 上找到的程序。

trans-unit.source: If no COMPONENTS are specified, Interpreter is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 COMPONENTS ，则假定为 Interpreter 器。

trans-unit.source: If no COMPONENTS is specified, Interpreter is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 COMPONENTS ，则假定为 Interpreter 器。

trans-unit.source: If no PREFIX, EP_PREFIX, or EP_BASE is specified, then the default is to set PREFIX to <name>-prefix. Relative paths are interpreted with respect to CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR at the point where ExternalProject_Add() is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 PREFIX ， EP_PREFIX 或 EP_BASE ，则默认设置是将 PREFIX 设置为 <name>-prefix 。相对路径在调用 ExternalProject_Add() 时相对于 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 进行解释。

trans-unit.source: If no VERSION is given, the PROJECT_VERSION variable is used. If this hasn’t been set, it errors out.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 VERSION ，则使用 PROJECT_VERSION 变量。如果尚未设置，则会出错。

trans-unit.source: If no [version] and/or component list is given to a recursive invocation inside a find-module, the corresponding arguments are forwarded automatically from the outer call (including the EXACT flag for [version]). Version support is currently provided only on a package-by-package basis (see the Version Selection section below). When a version range is specified but the package is only designed to expect a single version, the package will ignore the upper end point of the range and only take the single version at the lower end of the range into account.
trans-unit.target: 如果未向find-module内的递归调用提供 [version] 和/或组件列表，则将从外部调用（包括 [version] 的 EXACT 标志）自动转发相应的参数。当前仅在逐个软件包的基础上提供版本支持（请参阅下面的“版本选择”部分）。如果指定了版本范围，但该软件包仅设计用于单个版本，则该软件包将忽略该范围的上端，而仅考虑该范围下端的单个版本。

trans-unit.source: If no argument is given after ENV{<variable>} or if <value> is an empty string, then this command will clear any existing value of the environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 ENV{<variable>} 之后没有给出任何参数，或者 <value> 是一个空字符串，则此命令将清除环境变量的任何现有值。

trans-unit.source: If no arguments given, include_guard has the same scope as a variable, meaning that the include guard effect is isolated by the most recent function scope or current directory if no inner function scopes exist. In this case the command behavior is the same as:
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供任何参数，则 include_guard 具有与变量相同的作用域，这意味着如果没有内部函数作用域，则包含保护作用由最新的函数作用域或当前目录隔离。在这种情况下，命令行为与以下命令相同：

trans-unit.source: If no component is specified in the find_package() call, then it only searches for the ImageMagick executable directory. This code defines the following variables:
trans-unit.target: 如果在 find_package() 调用中未指定任何组件，则它仅搜索ImageMagick可执行目录。这段代码定义了以下变量：

trans-unit.source: If no explicit UNITY_BUILD_MODE has been specified, CMake will default to BATCH.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定显式 UNITY_BUILD_MODE ，则CMake将默认为 BATCH 。

trans-unit.source: If no explicit UNITY_BUILD_MODE has been specified, CMake will default to BATCH.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定显式 UNITY_BUILD_MODE ，则CMake将默认为 BATCH 。

trans-unit.source: If no explicit <format string> is given it will default to:
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出明确的 <format string> ，则默认为：

trans-unit.source: If no explicit <format_string> is given, it will default to:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出明确的 <format_string> ，它将默认为：

trans-unit.source: If no tests were found, the default behavior of CTest is to always log an error message but to return an error code in script mode only. This option unifies the behavior of CTest by either returning an error code if no tests were found or by ignoring it.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有找到测试,CTest的默认行为是总是记录错误信息,但只在脚本模式下返回错误代码。这个选项统一了CTest的行为,如果没有找到测试,则返回错误代码,或者忽略它。

trans-unit.source: If no value is set and if a .int file is added as a source file to the executable target it will be treated as an Integrity Application.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置任何值，并且将 .int 文件作为源文件添加到可执行目标中，则它将被视为 Integrity Application 。

trans-unit.source: If no variable name is given, removes exactly one element. Otherwise, assign the first element’s value to the given variable and removes it, up to the last variable name given.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出变量名，则只删除一个元素。否则，将第一个元素的值分配给给定变量并将其删除，直到给定的最后一个变量名。

trans-unit.source: If no variable name is given, removes exactly one element. Otherwise, assign the last element’s value to the given variable and removes it, up to the last variable name given.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出变量名，则只删除一个元素。否则，将最后一个元素的值分配给给定变量并将其删除，直到给定的最后一个变量名。

trans-unit.source: If not FALSE, use of deprecated functionality will issue warnings. If this variable is not set, CMake behaves as if it were set to TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是 FALSE ，则使用不赞成使用的功能将发出警告。如果未设置此变量，则CMake的行为就像设置为 TRUE 一样。

trans-unit.source: If not defined, search for shared libraries and static libraries in that order.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有定义,则依次搜索共享库和静态库。

trans-unit.source: If not set explicitly the value is initialized by the CMAKE_MSVCIDE_RUN_PATH environment variable, if set, and otherwise left empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置，则该值由 CMAKE_MSVCIDE_RUN_PATH 环境变量初始化（如果已设置），否则留空。

trans-unit.source: If not set explicitly the value is initialized by the MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET environment variable, if set, and otherwise computed based on the host platform.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置，则值由 MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET 环境变量初始化（如果已设置），否则根据主机平台进行计算。

trans-unit.source: If not set explicitly the value is initialized by the SDKROOT environment variable, if set, and otherwise computed based on the CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET or the host platform.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置，则值将由 SDKROOT 环境变量（如果已设置）初始化，否则将基于 CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET 或主机平台进行计算。

trans-unit.source: If not set, CMake treats this property as OFF by default. CMake generators that are capable of organizing into a hierarchy of folders use the values of the FOLDER target property to name those folders. See also the documentation for the FOLDER target property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，则默认情况下，CMake将此属性视为 OFF 。能够组织到文件夹层次结构中的CMake生成器使用 FOLDER target属性的值来命名这些文件夹。另请参见 FOLDER 目标属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: If not set, CMake uses “CMakePredefinedTargets” as a default value for this property. Targets such as INSTALL, PACKAGE and RUN_TESTS will be organized into this FOLDER. See also the documentation for the FOLDER target property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，则CMake使用“ CMakePredefinedTargets”作为此属性的默认值。目标（例如INSTALL，PACKAGE和RUN_TESTS）将组织到此文件夹中。另请参见 FOLDER 目标属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: If not set, CMake uses the FOLDER property of the parent target as a default value for this property. See also the documentation for the FOLDER target property and the AUTOMOC target property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，则CMake使用父目标的 FOLDER 属性作为该属性的默认值。另请参见有关 FOLDER 目标属性和 AUTOMOC 目标属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: If not set, the string “<TYPE> packages” is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，则使用字符串“ <TYPE> packages”。

trans-unit.source: If not set, this property uses the value of the CMAKE_JOB_POOLS variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，则此属性使用 CMAKE_JOB_POOLS 变量的值。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, CMake checks the CMAKE_GENERATOR environment variable and otherwise falls back to a builtin default selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则CMake将检查 CMAKE_GENERATOR 环境变量，否则回退到内置的默认选择。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the default will be false if using a NDK version that provides the unified headers and true otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则使用提供统一标头的NDK版本时，默认值为false；否则为true。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the default will be a value that selects the latest available GCC toolchain.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,默认为选择最新的GCC工具链。

trans-unit.source: If one or more package in this categories has not been found, CMake will abort when calling feature_summary() with the ‘FATAL_ON_MISSING_REQUIRED_PACKAGES’ option enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到此类别中的一个或多个软件包，则在启用了“ FATAL_ON_MISSING_REQUIRED_PACKAGES”选项的情况下调用 feature_summary() 时，CMake将中止。

trans-unit.source: If only basename_LIBRARY_RELEASE is defined, basename_LIBRARY will be set to the release value, and basename_LIBRARY_DEBUG will be set to basename_LIBRARY_DEBUG-NOTFOUND. If only basename_LIBRARY_DEBUG is defined, then basename_LIBRARY will take the debug value, and basename_LIBRARY_RELEASE will be set to basename_LIBRARY_RELEASE-NOTFOUND.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有 basename_LIBRARY_RELEASE 定义， basename_LIBRARY 将被设置为释放值， basename_LIBRARY_DEBUG 将被设置为 basename_LIBRARY_DEBUG-NOTFOUND 。如果仅定义了 basename_LIBRARY_DEBUG ，则 basename_LIBRARY 将使用调试值，并且 basename_LIBRARY_RELEASE 将设置为 basename_LIBRARY_RELEASE-NOTFOUND 。

trans-unit.source: If policy CMP0060 is not set to NEW, then when a library in one of these directories is given by full path to target_link_libraries() CMake will generate the -l<name> form on link lines for historical purposes.
trans-unit.target: 如果未将策略 CMP0060 设置为 NEW ，则当这些目录之一中的库通过 target_link_libraries() 的完整路径提供时，CMake会出于历史目的在链接线上生成 -l<name> 形式。

trans-unit.source: If policy CMP0068 is not NEW, this property also controls use of INSTALL_NAME_DIR in the build tree on macOS. Either way, the BUILD_WITH_INSTALL_NAME_DIR target property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果策略 CMP0068 不是 NEW ，则此属性还控制在macOS上的构建树中使用 INSTALL_NAME_DIR 。无论哪种方式， BUILD_WITH_INSTALL_NAME_DIR 目标属性都具有优先权。

trans-unit.source: If policy CMP0086 is set to NEW, -module <module_name> is passed to SWIG compiler.
trans-unit.target: 如果策略 CMP0086 设置为 NEW ，则 -module <module_name> 传递给 SWIG 编译器。

trans-unit.source: If possible, the MPI version will be determined by this module. The facilities to detect the MPI version were introduced with MPI-1.2, and therefore cannot be found for older MPI versions.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话,MPI版本将由这个模块来确定。检测MPI版本的功能是在MPI-1.2中引入的,因此不能用于旧的MPI版本。

trans-unit.source: If present and true, this will cause all libraries to be built shared unless the library was explicitly added as a static library. This variable is often added to projects as an option() so that each user of a project can decide if they want to build the project using shared or static libraries.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在且为true，这将导致所有库都构建为共享库，除非将该库显式添加为静态库。通常将此变量作为 option() 添加到项目中，以便项目的每个用户都可以决定是否要使用共享库或静态库来构建项目。

trans-unit.source: If provided, the optional comment will be passed as the COMMENT for the add_custom_target() command used to create the custom target internally.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的话，可选 comment 将作为用于内部创建自定义目标的 add_custom_target() 命令的 COMMENT 传递。

trans-unit.source: If required, you may select which files and directories to list or extract from the archive using the specified <patterns>. Wildcards are supported. If the PATTERNS option is not given, the entire archive will be listed or extracted.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要，您可以使用指定的 <patterns> 选择要从存档中列出或提取的文件和目录。支持通配符。如果未提供 PATTERNS 选项，则将列出或提取整个档案。

trans-unit.source: If set in the cache it is used to initialize the value of the RULE_MESSAGES property. Users may disable the option in their local build tree to disable granular messages and report only as each target completes in Makefile builds.
trans-unit.target: 如果在高速缓存中设置，它将用于初始化 RULE_MESSAGES 属性的值。用户可以在其本地构建树中禁用该选项以禁用细化消息，并仅在Makefile构建中的每个目标完成时进行报告。

trans-unit.source: If set this CMake script will be executed by CPack during its local [CPack-private] installation which is done right before packaging the files. The script is not called by e.g.: make install.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此CMake脚本，则CPack将在其本地[CPack-private]安装期间执行该操作，该安装是在打包文件之前完成的。该脚本不会被例如： make install 调用。

trans-unit.source: If set this will enable device linking on the library target. Normally device linking is deferred until a shared library or executable is generated, allowing for multiple static libraries to resolve device symbols at the same time when they are used by a shared library or executable.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,将启用库目标上的设备链接。通常设备链接会被推迟到共享库或可执行文件生成之后,允许多个静态库在被共享库或可执行文件使用时同时解析设备符号。

trans-unit.source: If set this will enable separable compilation for all CUDA files for the given target.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了这个选项,将启用对给定目标的所有CUDA文件的可分离编译。

trans-unit.source: If set to FALSE or undefined: Enable multiple version/component requirements.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 FALSE 或未定义：启用多个版本/组件要求。

trans-unit.source: If set to OFF it will never be emitted
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 OFF ，则永远不会发射

trans-unit.source: If set to ON it will always be emitted
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 ON ，它将始终被发射

trans-unit.source: If set to ONLY, then only the roots in CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH will be searched. If set to NEVER, then the roots in CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH will be ignored and only the host system root will be used. If set to BOTH, then the host system paths and the paths in CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH will be searched.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 ONLY ，则仅搜索 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 中的根。如果设置为 NEVER ，那么将忽略 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 中的根，并且仅使用主机系统根。如果设置为 BOTH ，那么将搜索主机系统路径和 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 中的路径。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, contents of target property INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES will be forwarded to SWIG compiler. If set to FALSE target property INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES will be ignored. If not set, target property SWIG_USE_TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES will be considered.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则目标属性 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 的内容将转发到 SWIG 编译器。如果设置为 FALSE ,则目标属性 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 将被忽略。如果未设置， SWIG_USE_TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 将考虑目标属性SWIG_USE_TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, contents of target property INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES will be forwarded to SWIG compiler. If set to FALSE or not defined, target property INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES will be ignored. This behavior can be overridden by specifying source property USE_TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则目标属性 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 的内容将转发到 SWIG 编译器。如果设置为 FALSE 或未定义，则将忽略目标属性 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 。通过指定源属性 USE_TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 可以覆盖此行为。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, values of variables prefixed with CPACK_ will be escaped before being written to the configuration files, so that the cpack program receives them exactly as they were specified. If not, characters like quotes and backslashes can cause parsing errors or alter the value received by the cpack program. Defaults to FALSE for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ，则以 CPACK_ 为前缀的变量的值在写入配置文件之前将被转义，以便cpack程序完全按照指定的方式接收它们。否则，诸如引号和反斜杠之类的字符可能会导致解析错误或更改cpack程序接收的值。为了向后兼容，默认为 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE: Create CMake cache entries for the above artifact specification variables so that users can edit them interactively. This disables support for multiple version/component requirements.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 TRUE ,则为上述工件规范变量创建CMake缓存条目，以便用户可以交互地对其进行编辑。这将禁用对多个版本/组件要求的支持。

trans-unit.source: If set to True, the test will be skipped and its status will be ‘Not Run’. A DISABLED test will not be counted in the total number of tests and its completion status will be reported to CDash as Disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 True ，则测试将被跳过，其状态将为“未运行”。已 DISABLED 测试将不计入测试总数，并且其完成状态将作为 Disabled 报告给CDash 。

trans-unit.source: If set to FALSE, search only for shared libraries.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为FALSE，则仅搜索共享库。

trans-unit.source: If set to TRUE, search only for static libraries.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为TRUE，则仅搜索静态库。

trans-unit.source: If set to a list of arguments those will be added to the scheme.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为参数列表,这些参数将被添加到方案中。

trans-unit.source: If set to a list of environment variables and values of the form MYVAR=value those environment variables will be added to the scheme.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为环境变量列表，并且格式为 MYVAR=value ,则这些环境变量将添加到方案中。

trans-unit.source: If set to a list of environment variables and values of the form MYVAR=value those environment variables will be defined while running the test. The environment is restored to its previous state after the test is done.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为环境变量列表，并且格式为 MYVAR=value ,则将在运行测试时定义这些环境变量。测试完成后，环境将还原到以前的状态。

trans-unit.source: If set to a list of files, the test will not be run unless all of the files exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为文件列表,则除非所有文件都存在,否则测试不会运行。

trans-unit.source: If set to a name then that name will be reported to CDASH as a named measurement with a value of 1. You may also specify a value by setting MEASUREMENT to measurement=value.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为名称，则该名称将作为命名度量报告给 CDASH ，其值为 1 。您也可以通过将 MEASUREMENT 设置为 measurement=value 来指定一个值。

trans-unit.source: If set to true then this is an object file.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true,那么这就是一个对象文件。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, enables interprocedural optimizations if they are known to be supported by the compiler. Depending on value of policy CMP0069, the error will be reported or ignored, if interprocedural optimization is enabled but not supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true，则在已知编译器 to be supported 过程间优化的情况下启用过程间优化。如果已启用但不支持过程间优化，则根据策略 CMP0069 的值，将报告或忽略该错误。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, enables interprocedural optimizations if they are known to be supported by the compiler.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "true",则在编译器已知支持的情况下启用程序间优化。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, this will invert the pass/fail flag of the test.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "true",将反转测试的通过/失败标志。

trans-unit.source: If set, CTest will update the repository’s submodules before updating.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则CTest将在更新之前更新存储库的子模块。

trans-unit.source: If set, checks only the specified vendor, if not set checks all the possibilities. List of vendors valid in this module:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,只检查指定的供应商,如果不设置则检查所有的可能性。本模块中有效的供应商列表。

trans-unit.source: If set, if the output matches one of specified regular expressions, the test will be marked as skipped. Example:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,如果输出符合指定的正则表达式之一,则测试将被标记为跳过。例子:

trans-unit.source: If set, if the output matches one of specified regular expressions, the test will fail. Example:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,如果输出符合指定的正则表达式之一,测试将失败。例子:

trans-unit.source: If set, report any undefined properties to this file.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则向该文件报告任何未定义的属性。

trans-unit.source: If set, specifies additional versions of Matlab that may be looked for. The variable should be a list of strings, organised by pairs of release name and versions, such as follows:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则指定可以查找的Matlab的其他版本。变量应该是一个字符串列表,按发布名称和版本对组织,例如以下。

trans-unit.source: If set, the CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE is included automatically on a per-generator basis. It only need contain overrides.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置， CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE 将在每个发电机的基础上自动包括在内。它只需要包含覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If set, the following variables are passed in to the generated try_compile CMakeLists.txt to initialize compile target properties with default values:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了,以下变量会被传递到生成的 try_compile CMakeLists.txt 中,以默认值初始化编译目标属性。

trans-unit.source: If set, the lookup of Matlab and the intermediate configuration steps are outputted to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则将Matlab的查找和中间的配置步骤输出到控制台。

trans-unit.source: If set, the test output will be checked against the specified regular expressions and at least one of the regular expressions has to match, otherwise the test will fail. Example:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,测试输出将根据指定的正则表达式进行检查,至少有一个正则表达式必须匹配,否则测试将失败。例子:如果设置了正则表达式,那么测试输出将根据指定的正则表达式进行检查,至少有一个正则表达式必须匹配,否则测试将失败。

trans-unit.source: If set, this causes the output from the custom step to be captured to files in the external project’s LOG_DIR if supplied or STAMP_DIR.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，这将导致来自定制步骤的输出被捕获到外部项目的 LOG_DIR (如果提供）或 STAMP_DIR 中的文件中。

trans-unit.source: If set, this property completely overrides the generic property for the named configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,此属性将完全覆盖命名配置的通用属性。

trans-unit.source: If set, this will tell the required compilers to enable device linking on the library target. Device linking is an additional link step required by some CUDA compilers when CUDA_SEPARABLE_COMPILATION is enabled. Normally device linking is deferred until a shared library or executable is generated, allowing for multiple static libraries to resolve device symbols at the same time when they are used by a shared library or executable.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，它将告诉所需的编译器在库目标上启用设备链接。启用 CUDA_SEPARABLE_COMPILATION 时，设备链接是某些CUDA编译器所需的附加链接步骤。通常，将设备链接推迟到生成共享库或可执行文件之前，从而允许多个静态库在共享库或可执行文件使用设备符号的同时解析设备符号。

trans-unit.source: If specified, configuration will error if a suitable CUDA Toolkit is not found.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了,如果没有找到合适的CUDA工具包,配置会出错。

trans-unit.source: If specified, describes the version of the CUDA Toolkit to search for.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了,说明要搜索的CUDA工具包的版本。

trans-unit.source: If specified, the CUDA Toolkit is considered found only if the exact VERSION specified is recovered.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，则仅当恢复指定的确切 VERSION 才认为已找到CUDA工具包。

trans-unit.source: If specified, the parameter is passed along with --gtest_output=xml: to test executable. The actual file name is the same as the test target, including prefix and suffix. This should be used instead of EXTRA_ARGS --gtest_output=xml to avoid race conditions writing the XML result output when using parallel test execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，则将参数与 --gtest_output=xml: 一起传递以测试可执行文件。实际文件名与测试目标相同，包括前缀和后缀。应该使用它代替 EXTRA_ARGS --gtest_output=xml ,以避免在使用并行测试执行时竞争条件写入XML结果输出。

trans-unit.source: If specified, the search for a suitable CUDA Toolkit will not produce any messages.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定,搜索合适的CUDA工具包将不会产生任何消息。

trans-unit.source: If such a library target has this property set to TRUE it will be built as a framework when built on the macOS and iOS. It will have the directory structure required for a framework and will be suitable to be used with the -framework option. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_FRAMEWORK variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果此类库目标将此属性设置为 TRUE ，则在macOS和iOS上构建时，它将作为框架构建。它具有框架所需的目录结构，并且适合与 -framework 选项一起使用。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则该属性由 CMAKE_FRAMEWORK 变量的值初始化。

trans-unit.source: If that property is not set then CMake uses an appropriate default value based on the compiler to select the CUDA runtime library.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性没有设置,那么CMake就会根据编译器选择CUDA运行时库,使用一个合适的默认值。

trans-unit.source: If the FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIB32_PATHS global property is set all search paths will be tested as normal, with 32/ appended, and with all matches of lib/ replaced with lib32/. This property is automatically set for the platforms that are known to need it if at least one of the languages supported by the project() command is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIB32_PATHS 全局属性，则将正常测试所有搜索路径，并附加 32/ ，并将所有 lib/ 匹配项替换为 lib32/ 。如果启用了 project() 命令支持的至少一种语言，则会为已知需要该平台的平台自动设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If the FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIB64_PATHS global property is set all search paths will be tested as normal, with 64/ appended, and with all matches of lib/ replaced with lib64/. This property is automatically set for the platforms that are known to need it if at least one of the languages supported by the project() command is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIB64_PATHS 全局属性，则将对所有搜索路径进行正常测试，并附加 64/ ，并将所有 lib/ 匹配项替换为 lib64/ 。如果启用了 project() 命令支持的至少一种语言，则会为已知需要该平台的平台自动设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If the FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIBX32_PATHS global property is set all search paths will be tested as normal, with x32/ appended, and with all matches of lib/ replaced with libx32/. This property is automatically set for the platforms that are known to need it if at least one of the languages supported by the project() command is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIBX32_PATHS 全局属性，则将对所有搜索路径进行常规测试，并添加 x32/ ，并将所有 lib/ 匹配项替换为 libx32/ 。如果启用了 project() 命令支持的至少一种语言，则会为已知需要该平台的平台自动设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If the JOB_POOLS global property is not set, the value of this variable is used in its place. See JOB_POOLS for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 JOB_POOLS 全局属性，则使用该变量的值代替其位置。有关其他信息，请参见 JOB_POOLS 。

trans-unit.source: If the EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL target property is set on a target then its value determines whether the target is included in the “all” target of this directory and its ancestors.
trans-unit.target: 如果在目标上设置了 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 目标属性，则其值将确定目标是否包括在此目录及其祖先的“所有”目标中。

trans-unit.source: If the CMAKE_ANDROID_API variable is set, its value is used as the API level.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 CMAKE_ANDROID_API 变量，则将其值用作API级别。

trans-unit.source: If the CMAKE_ANDROID_NDK variable is set, the NDK at the specified location will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 CMAKE_ANDROID_NDK 变量，将使用指定位置的NDK。

trans-unit.source: If the CMAKE_FIND_LIBRARY_CUSTOM_LIB_SUFFIX variable is set all search paths will be tested as normal, with the suffix appended, and with all matches of lib/ replaced with lib${CMAKE_FIND_LIBRARY_CUSTOM_LIB_SUFFIX}/. This variable overrides the FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIB32_PATHS, FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIBX32_PATHS, and FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIB64_PATHS global properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 CMAKE_FIND_LIBRARY_CUSTOM_LIB_SUFFIX 变量，则将按常规测试所有搜索路径，并附加后缀，并用 lib${CMAKE_FIND_LIBRARY_CUSTOM_LIB_SUFFIX}/ 替换 lib/ 所有匹配项。此变量将覆盖 FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIB32_PATHS ， FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIBX32_PATHS 和 FIND_LIBRARY_USE_LIB64_PATHS 全局属性。

trans-unit.source: If the CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE or CMAKE_PROJECT_<PROJECT-NAME>_INCLUDE variables are set, the files they point to will be included as the last step of the project() command. If both are set, then CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE will be included before CMAKE_PROJECT_<PROJECT-NAME>_INCLUDE.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE 或 CMAKE_PROJECT_<PROJECT-NAME>_INCLUDE 变量，则它们指向的文件将作为 project() 命令的最后一步包括在内。如果两者都设置，那么 CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE 将被包括在 CMAKE_PROJECT_<PROJECT-NAME>_INCLUDE 之前。

trans-unit.source: If the CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE_BEFORE or CMAKE_PROJECT_<PROJECT-NAME>_INCLUDE_BEFORE variables are set, the files they point to will be included as the first step of the project() command. If both are set, then CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE_BEFORE will be included before CMAKE_PROJECT_<PROJECT-NAME>_INCLUDE_BEFORE.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE_BEFORE 或 CMAKE_PROJECT_<PROJECT-NAME>_INCLUDE_BEFORE 变量，则它们指向的文件将作为 project() 命令的第一步包括在内。如果两者都设置，则 CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE_BEFORE 将被包括在 CMAKE_PROJECT_<PROJECT-NAME>_INCLUDE_BEFORE 之前。

trans-unit.source: If the CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE_BEFORE variable is set, the file pointed to by that variable will be included as the first step of the project() command.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE_BEFORE 变量，则该变量指向的文件将作为 project() 命令的第一步包括在内。

trans-unit.source: If the CMAKE_SYSROOT variable is set, the API level is detected from the NDK directory structure containing the sysroot.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 CMAKE_SYSROOT 变量，则从包含sysroot的NDK目录结构中检测到API级别。

trans-unit.source: If the CTEST_CHECKOUT_COMMAND variable (or the CTEST_CVS_CHECKOUT variable) is set, its content is treated as command-line. The command is invoked with the current working directory set to the parent of the source directory, even if the source directory already exists. This can be used to create the source tree from a version control repository.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 CTEST_CHECKOUT_COMMAND 变量（或 CTEST_CVS_CHECKOUT 变量），则将其内容视为命令行。即使源目录已经存在，也会在当前工作目录设置为源目录的父目录的情况下调用该命令。这可用于从版本控制存储库创建源树。

trans-unit.source: If the <LANG> compiler passes to the linker an architecture-specific system library search directory such as <prefix>/lib/<arch> this variable contains the <arch> name if/as detected by CMake.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <LANG> 编译器将链接特定于体系结构的系统库搜索目录（例如 <prefix>/lib/<arch> )传递给链接器，则此变量将包含CMake检测到的 <arch> 名称。

trans-unit.source: If the <code> could be built and run successfully, the internal cache variable specified by <resultVar> will be set to 1, otherwise it will be set to an value that evaluates to boolean false (e.g. an empty string or an error message).
trans-unit.target: 如果 <code> 可以成功构建并运行，则 <resultVar> 指定的内部缓存变量将被设置为1，否则将被设置为一个值，该值的计算结果为布尔值false（例如，空字符串或错误消息） 。

trans-unit.source: If the <ui_base>.ui file was found, uic is called on it to generate ui_<ui_base>.h in the directory
trans-unit.target: 如果找到 <ui_base>.ui 文件，将在其上调用 uic 以在目录中生成 ui_<ui_base>.h

trans-unit.source: If the :<type> portion is given it must be one of the types specified by the set() command documentation for its CACHE signature. If the :<type> portion is omitted the entry will be created with no type if it does not exist with a type already. If a command in the project sets the type to PATH or FILEPATH then the <value> will be converted to an absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 :<type> 部分，则该部分必须是 set() 命令文档为其 CACHE 签名指定的类型之一。如果省略 :<type> 部分，则该条目将不创建任何类型（如果该类型尚不存在）。如果项目中的命令将类型设置为 PATH 或 FILEPATH ,则 <value> 将转换为绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: If the APPEND option is given the list is appended to any existing property value (except that empty values are ignored and not appended). If the APPEND_STRING option is given the string is appended to any existing property value as string, i.e. it results in a longer string and not a list of strings. When using APPEND or APPEND_STRING with a property defined to support INHERITED behavior (see define_property()), no inheriting occurs when finding the initial value to append to. If the property is not already directly set in the nominated scope, the command will behave as though APPEND or APPEND_STRING had not been given.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 APPEND 选项，则该列表将附加到任何现有属性值之后（空值将被忽略且不附加）。如果给定了 APPEND_STRING 选项，则该字符串将作为字符串附加到任何现有属性值之后，即，它导致更长的字符串而不是字符串列表。当使用定义为支持 INHERITED 行为的属性使用 APPEND 或 APPEND_STRING 时（请参见 define_property() ），在查找要附加的初始值时不会发生继承。如果尚未在指定范围内直接设置该属性，则该命令的行为就像未指定 APPEND 或 APPEND_STRING 。

trans-unit.source: If the APPEND option is given the list is appended to any existing property value. If the APPEND_STRING option is given the string is appended to any existing property value as string, i.e. it results in a longer string and not a list of strings. When using APPEND or APPEND_STRING with a property defined to support INHERITED behavior (see define_property()), no inheriting occurs when finding the initial value to append to. If the property is not already directly set in the nominated scope, the command will behave as though APPEND or APPEND_STRING had not been given.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 APPEND 选项，则该列表将附加到任何现有属性值之后。如果给定了 APPEND_STRING 选项，则将字符串作为字符串附加到任何现有属性值之后，即，它导致更长的字符串而不是字符串列表。当使用具有定义为支持 INHERITED 行为的属性的 APPEND 或 APPEND_STRING 时（请参见 define_property() ），在查找要附加的初始值时不会发生继承。如果尚未在指定范围内直接设置该属性，则该命令的行为就像未给出 APPEND 或 APPEND_STRING 。

trans-unit.source: If the BUILTIN_TYPES_ONLY option is not given, the macro checks for headers <sys/types.h>, <stdint.h>, and <stddef.h>, and saves results in HAVE_SYS_TYPES_H, HAVE_STDINT_H, and HAVE_STDDEF_H. The type size check automatically includes the available headers, thus supporting checks of types defined in the headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 BUILTIN_TYPES_ONLY 选项，则宏将检查标头 <sys/types.h> ， <stdint.h> 和 <stddef.h> ，并将结果保存在 HAVE_SYS_TYPES_H ， HAVE_STDINT_H 和 HAVE_STDDEF_H 中。类型大小检查会自动包括可用的标题，从而支持检查标题中定义的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the BU_CHMOD_BUNDLE_ITEMS variable is set then bundle items will be marked writable before install_name_tool tries to change them.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 BU_CHMOD_BUNDLE_ITEMS 变量，则在 install_name_tool 尝试更改捆绑商品之前，捆绑商品将被标记为可写。

trans-unit.source: If the CONFIGURE_DEPENDS flag is specified, CMake will add logic to the main build system check target to rerun the flagged GLOB commands at build time. If any of the outputs change, CMake will regenerate the build system.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 CONFIGURE_DEPENDS 标志，则CMake将向主构建系统检查目标添加逻辑以在构建时重新运行已标记的 GLOB 命令。如果任何输出更改，CMake将重新生成构建系统。

trans-unit.source: If the CUDA language has been enabled we will use the directory containing the compiler as the first search location for nvcc.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了 CUDA 语言，我们将使用包含编译器的目录作为 nvcc 的第一个搜索位置。

trans-unit.source: If the CUDAToolkit_ROOT cmake configuration variable (e.g., -DCUDAToolkit_ROOT=/some/path) or environment variable is defined, it will be searched. If both an environment variable and a configuration variable are specified, the configuration variable takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了 CUDAToolkit_ROOT cmake配置变量（例如， -DCUDAToolkit_ROOT=/some/path ）或环境变量，则将对其进行搜索。如果同时指定了环境变量和配置变量，则配置变量优先。

trans-unit.source: If the Config.cmake file is found and the optionally-specified version is satisfied, then the CMake find_package() command considers the package to be found and the entire library package is assumed to be complete as designed.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到了 Config.cmake 文件，并且满足了可选的指定版本，则CMake find_package() 命令将考虑要找到的包，并且假定整个库包已按设计完成。

trans-unit.source: If the EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL argument is provided then targets in the subdirectory will not be included in the ALL target of the parent directory by default, and will be excluded from IDE project files. Users must explicitly build targets in the subdirectory. This is meant for use when the subdirectory contains a separate part of the project that is useful but not necessary, such as a set of examples. Typically the subdirectory should contain its own project() command invocation so that a full build system will be generated in the subdirectory (such as a VS IDE solution file). Note that inter-target dependencies supersede this exclusion. If a target built by the parent project depends on a target in the subdirectory, the dependee target will be included in the parent project build system to satisfy the dependency.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 参数，则默认情况下，子目录中的目标将不包括在父目录的 ALL 目标中，并且将从IDE项目文件中排除。用户必须在子目录中显式构建目标。当子目录包含项目的有用但不必要的单独部分（例如一组示例）时，可以使用此功能。通常，子目录应包含自己的 project() 命令调用，以便在子目录（例如VS IDE解决方案文件）中生成完整的构建系统。请注意，目标间依存关系取代了此排除条件。如果父项目构建的目标依赖于子目录中的目标，则被依赖者目标将包括在父项目构建系统中，以满足相关性。

trans-unit.source: If the INHERITED option is given, then the get_property() command will chain up to the next higher scope when the requested property is not set in the scope given to the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 INHERITED 选项，则在给定命令的作用域中未设置请求的属性时， get_property() 命令将链接到下一个更高的作用域。

trans-unit.source: If the INSTALL_PREFIX argument is passed, this is used as base path to calculate all the relative paths. The <path> argument must be an absolute path. If this argument is not passed, the CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX variable will be used instead. The default value is good when generating a FooConfig.cmake file to use your package from the install tree. When generating a FooConfig.cmake file to use your package from the build tree this option should be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了 INSTALL_PREFIX 参数，则将其用作计算所有相对路径的基本路径。所述 <path> 参数必须是绝对路径。如果未传递此参数，则将 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 变量。生成FooConfig.cmake文件以使用安装树中的程序包时，默认值很好。在生成FooConfig.cmake文件以使用构建树中的软件包时，应使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: If the MODULE option is not specfied in the above signature, CMake first searches for the package using Module mode. Then, if the package is not found, it searches again using Config mode. A user may set the variable CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG to TRUE to direct CMake first search using Config mode before falling back to Module mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果以上签名中未指定 MODULE 选项，则CMake首先使用模块模式搜索软件包。然后，如果找不到该软件包，它将使用Config模式再次搜索。用户可以将变量 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG 设置为 TRUE ,以使用Config模式引导CMake首次搜索，然后返回到Module模式。

trans-unit.source: If the MODULE option is not specified in the above signature, CMake first searches for the package using Module mode. Then, if the package is not found, it searches again using Config mode. A user may set the variable CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG to TRUE to direct CMake first search using Config mode before falling back to Module mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果在上述签名中未指定 MODULE 选项，则CMake首先使用模块模式搜索软件包。然后，如果找不到该软件包，它将使用Config模式再次搜索。用户可以将变量 CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG 设置为 TRUE ,以使用Config模式引导CMake首次搜索，然后再回到Module模式。

trans-unit.source: If the NO_DEPENDS option is specified, the step target will not depend on the dependencies of the external project (i.e. on any dependencies of the <name> custom target created by ExternalProject_Add()). This is usually safe for the download, update and patch steps, since they do not typically require that the dependencies are updated and built. Using NO_DEPENDS for any of the other pre-defined steps, however, may break parallel builds. Only use NO_DEPENDS where it is certain that the named steps genuinely do not have dependencies. For custom steps, consider whether or not the custom commands require the dependencies to be configured, built and installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 NO_DEPENDS 选项，则步骤目标将不依赖于外部项目的依赖关系（即，依赖于 ExternalProject_Add() 创建的 <name> 自定义目标的任何依赖关系）。这对于 download ， update 和 patch 步骤通常是安全的，因为它们通常不需要更新和构建依赖项。但是，对其他任何预定义步骤使用 NO_DEPENDS 可能会中断并行构建。仅使用 NO_DEPENDS 确定命名步骤确实没有依赖性的地方。对于自定义步骤，请考虑自定义命令是否需要配置，构建和安装依赖项。

trans-unit.source: If the PARENT_SCOPE option is given the variable will be set in the scope above the current scope. Each new directory or function creates a new scope. This command will set the value of a variable into the parent directory or calling function (whichever is applicable to the case at hand). The previous state of the variable’s value stays the same in the current scope (e.g., if it was undefined before, it is still undefined and if it had a value, it is still that value).
